forum.ajax.php

00001 <?php
00002 require "../config.php";
00003 require "ajax.class.php";
00004 
00005 /**
00006  * All ajax functions relating to forums.
00007  *
00008  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00009  * @see OsimoAjax
00010  */
00011 class OsimoAjaxForum extends OsimoAjax{
00012 
00013  /**
00014   * Class constructor.
00015   * Ajax triggers are set here.
00016   */
00017  function OsimoAjaxForum() {
00018   parent::OsimoAjax();
00019   $this->register(
00020    array(
00021     "loadPage"=>"load_page"
00022    )
00023   );
00024  }
00025 
00026  /**
00027   * Loads a forum page for ajax-enabled themes.
00028   */
00029  protected function load_page() {
00030   $forum = get('osimo')->POST['forum'];
00031   $page = get('osimo')->POST['page'];
00032 
00033   $html = get('data')->do_standard_loop('forum', $forum, $page, false);
00034   $pagination = get('theme')->pagination_numbers('forum', $forum, $page);
00035   $this->json_return(array("html"=>$html, "pagination"=>$pagination));
00036  }
00037 
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * Class is automatically instantiated so that
00043  * the ajax triggers set up in the constructor can 
00044  * be set and the proper one chosen for the incoming
00045  * data over ajax.
00046  */
00047 new OsimoAjaxForum();
00048 ?>
